name: Slice and Bite
storyline:
Cosimo is a young vampire with dreams of freedom. He wants to be out in the world, having adventures and writing sad, sad poetry.
Instead, he is stuck doing pizza delivery for his family's failing business. Every night he travels the roads of a forever-dark medieval Italy, dealing with nasty demons that want to rob him, and rude costumers that won't even tip.
Until one day, right when things can't get any worse, his father's nemesis, Barone Calzone, declares war on his family. And not any kind of war, a *fast food* war!
With a brand new magical carriage and fire in his heart, Cosimo will deliver the fastest, hottest pizzas in town, just to show the Barone who's the real boss on the road.
And maybe, at the end of the day, get enough tips to buy his own ride...
summary: You are a pizza delivering vampire in demon infested medieval Italy. Choose your delivery routes and upgrade your magical carriage. Save your family pizzeria from certain doom by slicing your way through levels, defeating challenging boss fights, uncovering secrets and exploring the world.
